displayName.english: I, Dusty McClean, have a dream!
displayName.french: Je suis Aspi McMénage, et j’ai un rêve !
displayName.german: Ich, Pico von Proper, habe einen Traum!
displayName.brazilian: Eu, Aspira McPó, tenho um sonho!
displayName.tchinese: 我，塵仔‧萬潔靈，有一個夢想！
displayName.japanese: 私、ダスティー・マクリーンには夢がありマス！

description.english: Enter the TV world
description.french: Entrer dans le monde de la télé
description.german: Begib dich in die TV-Dimension.
description.brazilian: Entre no mundo da TV
description.spanish: Entrar en la dimensión de la tele.
description.latam: Entra a la dimensión televisiva.
description.schinese: 进入电视世界
description.tchinese: 進入電視世界
description.japanese: テレビの世界に入る

description.english: Get your robo-revenge and save the family
description.french: Avoir assouvi sa vengeance et sauvé la famille
description.german: Roboräche dich und rette die Familie.
description.polish: Dokonaj robotycznej zemsty i uratuj rodzinę
description.brazilian: Robovingue-se e salve a família
description.spanish: Consigue tu robovenganza y salva a tu familia.
description.latam: Véngate y salva a tu familia.
description.schinese: 完成你的机器复仇，拯救净家人
description.tchinese: 進行機械人反擊戰及拯救你的家人
description.japanese: ロボリベンジを果たし、家族を救う

description.english: Unlock all abilities and perks
description.french: Déverrouiller tous les traits et compétences
description.german: Schalte alle Fähigkeiten und Vorteile frei.

description.latam: Desbloquea todas las habilidades y rasgos.

description.tchinese: 解鎖所有能力及輔助能力

description.english: Kill an enemy using the cat

description.tchinese: 使用狗殺死一位敵人

description.english: Eat an enemy by landing on their head

description.english: Defeat RoboPal 9000 without taking any damage

description.german: Besiege RoboPal 9000, ohne Schaden zu erleiden.
description.russian: Победи робота-пылесоса RoboPal 9000, не получив урона
description.brazilian: Derrote RoboAmigo 9000 sem tomar nenhum dano
description.spanish: Derrota a RoboColegui 9000 sin sufrir daño.
description.latam: Derrota al Roboamigo 9000 sin recibir daño
description.schinese: 无伤消灭家务助手9000
description.tchinese: 在不受任何傷害下擊敗 RonoPal 9000
description.japanese: ダメージを受けずにRoboPal 9000を倒す

description.english: Kill 2 enemies with 1 claymore
description.french: Tuer 2 ennemis avec une seule claymore
description.german: Töte 2 Gegner mit 1 Antipersonenmine.
description.brazilian: Mate 2 inimigos com 1 espadão
description.spanish: Mata a 2 enemigos con 1 mina antipersona.
description.latam: Mata a 2 enemigos con una mina antipersonal.
description.schinese: 利用一个克莱莫杀伤地雷杀死两个敌人
description.tchinese: 使用一個地雷殺死兩位敵人
description.japanese: クレイモア1つで敵を2体倒す

description.english: Kill an enemy with the Security Cameras
description.french: Tuer un ennemi avec les caméras de sécurité
description.german: Töte einen Gegner mit den Überwachungskameras.
description.russian: Убей врага при помощи камер слежения
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo com as Câmeras de Segurança
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con las cámaras de seguridad.
description.latam: Mata a un enemigo con las cámaras de seguridad.
description.schinese: 利用监控摄像头杀死一个敌人
description.tchinese: 用保安相機殺死一位敵人
description.japanese: 監視カメラで敵を倒す
